extendedInfo.description: This application was prepared by the Federal Deputy Benedita da Silva to provide the citizen with free access to a part of labor legislation in Brazil. The apps offers a calculator to simulate the job compensation upon the ending of the contract.This is not a manual labor legislation, but a facilitator for the most common situations in which citizens need to solve some questions on it.The same content can be accessed by the website www.beneditadasilva.com.br. You will not need to install anything. Just use your internet browser.For your confidence, the calculations included in the calculator have been thoroughly tested by experts in Labor Law. If you find any discrepancy please notify us.
